channel.title: TheLandofLegends Where Legends Collide
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/s3nj0z.png[/img]
Join TheLandofLegends today an experience something new and great find your new home here at TheLandofLegends! A great place to be!
Homepage: http://thelandoflegends.org/
Forums: http://thelandoflegends.org/TheLandofLegends/
Webclient: http://www.thelandoflegends.org/webclient.html
A Little Media:
http://gyazo.com/27ddaaf56fec8e5ee41f5c6c16cfa684
http://gyazo.com/7892c647bfa051b7bbc9342b112f032e I use window 8 cause's lag for me alot
http://gyazo.com/bc57074a66cc87ba5b4f10d5e5929f90
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ni39yx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ryqao5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2wc05ds.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2md185c.png[/img]
Some Features:
There is also a Custom PVP system that allows you to activate it for bonus exp. You can battle other players around the land while skilling or pvming you may only attack others who have this activated as well.
* Full Legit Summoning
* Real clan chats
*Polypore Dungeon
*Consistent updates. I make updates on things all day long I'm working on things when I'm not in school
*Dwarf Multi Cannon
* Rares partyhats h ween masks etc give exp bonus when wearing
*COMPLETE BOUNTY HUNTER
*Advanced ClanChat Fully Functional
* Polypore staff Balanced doesnt combo 40s every hit
* Armadyl Battle Staff balanced
*Full Chaotic
* PvP Armor
*Curses 100%
*Skillng Zones
*Many Pk Locations
*All Skills Functioning
*Fast Fluid Client
*Perfected Eco
*Amazing Stability
*Perfect Switching
*Xp Counter
*Full Clan Chat System
*Many Training Locations
*A Lot Of Bosses
*Fun Killstreak System
*Frost Dragons
*Revenant Monsters
*Autocasting
Monsters:
* TzTok*Jad
* Ice Jungle and Desert Strykewyrm
* Glacors
* Nex
* General Graardor along with the rest of GWD bosses
* Frost Dragons
* King Black Dragon
* Dagannoth Kings
* Corporeal Beast
*Nex
*Barrows
*Godwars
*Tormented Demons
*Fight Pits
*KQ
*Fight Caves
*Economy
*And so much more come and visit us today!!

item.title: TheLandofLegends Where Legends Collide

@TheLandofLegends wrote:

Thanks so does the community I love it ill never change to a different one
